info.name: Clementine Shop - Complete API
info.description: Full E-commerce API with Authentication, Categories, Products, Coupons, Cart, Orders, Inventory, Addresses, Wishlist, Reviews, User Profile, and Dashboard Analytics

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Elegant Silk Dress",
  "slug": "elegant-silk-dress",
  "description": "Luxurious silk dress perfect for special occasions. Features elegant design with comfortable fit.",
  "price": 89.99,
  "comparePrice": 129.99,
  "sku": "DRS-001",
  "categoryId": "{{categoryId}}",
  "images": [
    "https://example.com/dress1.jpg",
    "https://example.com/dress2.jpg"
  ],
  "sizes": ["S", "M", "L", "XL"],
  "colors": ["Black", "Navy", "Red"],
  "stock": 50,
  "isActive": true,
  "isFeatured": true,
  "tags": ["dress", "silk", "elegant", "formal"]
}

item.name: Remove from Wishlist by Item ID
Remove from Wishlist by Product ID

body.raw:
{
  "productId": "{{productId}}",
  "rating": 5,
  "title": "Excellent Product!",
  "comment": "This product exceeded my expectations. Highly recommended!",
  "images": ["https://example.com/review-image1.jpg"]
}
